Description:
Detects the execution of "dctask64.exe", a signed binary by ZOHO Corporation part of ManageEngine Endpoint Central.
This binary can be abused for DLL injection, arbitrary command and process execution.


Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: ManageEngine Endpoint Central Dctask64.EXE Potential Abuse
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\dctask64.exe' and (hashes like '%6834b1b94e49701d77ccb3c0895e1afd%' or hashes like '%1bb6f93b129f398c7c4a76bb97450bba%' or hashes like '%faa2ac19875fade461c8d89dcf2710a3%' or hashes like '%f1039ced4b91572ab7847d26032e6bbf%')) and (command like '% executecmd64 %' or command like '% invokeexe %' or command like '% injectdll %'))
